comment.author: 29066848@N04
comment._content:
I think maybe it's supposed to read "from estuary".

I'm not aware of a place on the south shore of the Dyfi called "Eustany" and the only references I can find online to "Eustany" are links to this picture (mostly people selling prints of it - cheeky!)

comment.author: 8370219@N06
comment._content: Mark, could it have been a name the ferry shelter was called by perhaps, but probably as you say, meant the estuary.
